localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: The Walden Directory is a community of high quality coaches, across a wide range of specialties. Find your perfect coach, set up a discovery call or send them a message to learn more.
nodes.title: Walden Directory - A vibrant community of high quality coaches
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Common Surface is a powerful hybrid working platform that handles all the complexity of building effective, flexible, hybrid work cultures - but saves you from the frustration, difficulty and conflict that arises from trying to do it using traditional methods.
nodes.title: Common Surface - Unlock all the benefits of hybrid working, hassle-free
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: The SavvyCal meeting scheduler you know and love â€” now with iCloud Calendar.
nodes.title: SavvyCal for iCloud - Scheduling links for iCloud, plus Google, Outlook, Fastmail
nodes.author: Derrick Reimer

nodes.excerpt: Instead of sending emails back-and-forth, just share a TidyCal link & let the other person choose a time that works for them. Create multiple booking types, connect up to 10 calendars, & integrate with Zoom, Google Meet, Zapier, Google Calendar & Office 365.
nodes.title: TidyCal 2.0 - Scheduling that's 10x faster & 10x simpler
nodes.author: Luke Cannon

nodes.excerpt: One place to find time & plan events without leaving the chat. Join our Early Access Program to use Onin first.
nodes.title: Onin - Plan events without leaving the conversation
nodes.author: Ryan Brodie

nodes.excerpt: A free MS Project alternative for simple gantt charts. Create project plans with tasks and schedules. Save asgantt files and share with anyone to open and edit for free with a web browser. No need to buy any license or install any software.
nodes.title: Online Gantt - A free MS Project alternative for simple gantt charts
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: A personal dashboard on your new tab page that helps you self-manage and be more productive. This is Dastyar, a Chrome productivity extension that overrides your new tab page with a personal dashboard.
nodes.title: Dastyaaaar - Personal dashboard for Chrome to help you be more productive
nodes.author: Alireza Eskandari

nodes.excerpt: Sync your Calendar with Notion, and vice-versa. Get started in few minutes and get all your meeting notes connected automatically with your Google Calendar.

nodes.author: Alex. Delivet

nodes.excerpt: Being a solopreneur running an appointment based business comes with an administrative burden. Encuadrado an all-in-one solution that encompasses booking, getting paid & invoicing, enabling self-employed professionals in LATAM to focus on their craft.
